00030 /**
00031  * Class for the TCA 'group' field
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Tca_Field_Group extends tx_oop_Tca_Field
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The type of the field
00042      */
00043     protected $_fieldType = 'group';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * 
00047      */
00048     public function setAsFile( $allowed, $maxItems = 1, $minItems = 0 )
00049     {
00050         $this->_config[ 'internal_type' ] = 'file';
00051         $this->_config[ 'allowed' ]       = $allowed;
00052         $this->_config[ 'uploadfolder' ]  = $this->_uploadDirectory;
00053         $this->_config[ 'show_thumbs' ]  = true;
00054         $this->_config[ 'maxitems' ]     = $maxItems;
00055         $this->_config[ 'minitems' ]     = $minItems;
00056         $this->_config[ 'size' ]         = ( $maxItems > 1 ) ? 5 : 1;
00057     }
00058     
00059     /**
00060      * 
00061      */
00062     public function setAsDb( $allowed, $maxItems = 1, $minItems = 0 )
00063     {
00064         $this->_config[ 'internal_type' ] = 'db';
00065         $this->_config[ 'allowed' ]       = $allowed;
00066         $this->_config[ 'maxitems' ]     = $maxItems;
00067         $this->_config[ 'minitems' ]     = $minItems;
00068         $this->_config[ 'size' ]         = ( $maxItems > 1 ) ? 5 : 1;
00069     }
00070     
00071     /**
00072      * 
00073      */
00074     public function setAsFolder( $maxItems = 1, $minItems = 0 )
00075     {
00076         $this->_config[ 'internal_type' ] = 'folder';
00077         $this->_config[ 'allowed' ]       = $allowed;
00078         $this->_config[ 'maxitems' ]     = $maxItems;
00079         $this->_config[ 'minitems' ]     = $minItems;
00080         $this->_config[ 'size' ]         = ( $maxItems > 1 ) ? 5 : 1;
00081     }
00082 }
